snippet: The one-year deal was believed to be worth at least $250 million to the N.F.L., which wants Thursday games to someday approach the viewership of Sunday and Monday games.
abstract: CBS announces that it will carry eight Thursday night football games in 2014 on a one-year contract that is believed to be worth at least $250 million.
lead_paragraph: The one-year deal was believed to be worth at least $250 million to the N.F.L., which wants Thursday games to someday approach the viewership of Sunday and Monday games.

headline.main: CBS Will Broadcast Thursday Night Games
headline.print_headline: Thursday Games are Going to CBS
